name: Apec Digital Solutions
tagline: AI-Powered Digital Transformation & Custom Software Solutions
overview: Apec Digital Solutions is a leading technology company specializing in AI/ML solutions, custom software development, and digital transformation services. Founded in 2018, we help businesses leverage cutting-edge technology to automate operations, enhance customer experiences, and drive sustainable growth.

ai_ml_services.llm_integrations: ChatGPT and LLM integrations, custom AI assistants, RAG applications
ai_ml_services.ai_agents: Workflow automation with LangChain/LangGraph, multi-agent systems
ai_ml_services.nlp: Sentiment analysis, text classification, language translation

sample_projects.title: AI Customer Service Platform
sample_projects.description: Built intelligent chatbot using GPT-4 and RAG technology that automated 80% of support tickets, reducing response time by 90% and saving 60% in support costs.
sample_projects.results: 90% faster response time, 60% cost savings, 91% customer satisfaction

sample_projects.title: Supply Chain Optimization System
sample_projects.description: ML-powered demand forecasting and inventory optimization system that reduced stockouts by 40% and saved $2M annually.
sample_projects.results: $2M annual savings, 40% fewer stockouts, 15% better forecast accuracy

sample_projects.title: HIPAA-Compliant Telemedicine Platform
sample_projects.description: Secure telemedicine platform with video consultations, EHR integration, and e-prescriptions handling 10,000+ monthly consultations.

key_differentiators: AI-First Approach - Every solution incorporates intelligent automation
Full-Stack Expertise - From UI to ML models to cloud infrastructure
Agile Methodology - 2-week sprints with regular demos
